Title: Holiday in the Commune
Designer: Yang Yun (阳云)Wu BingdeLiang Zhaotang (梁照堂)Zhao Weimin
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: Commune members at a festival. In the foreground a shooting game, mid left "Lantern Riddles", mid right a fishing game for children, in the background table tennis.
